title: Tata Power partners Druk Green for hydropower project in Bhutan
description: Tata Power formed a partnership with Druk Green Power Corporation Limited for a 600 MW hydropower project in Bhutan. With a 40% equity stake, the estimated project cost is â‚¹6,900 crore. The company plans to explore additional projects in Bhutan in the coming years to utilize hydropower's potential.
